mapper.select: SELECT id, NAME, num, danwei, save_method, save_site, user_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM sys_user a WHERE a.user_id = c.user_id ) user_name, create_time, com_in_time, DATE_FORMAT( com_in_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) startTimeStr, com_out_time, remark, type, flag, chuzhi, STATUS, shiyong_user_id, ( SELECT a.NAME FROM sys_user a WHERE a.user_id = c.shiyong_user_id ) shiyong_user_name FROM weihuapin_info c where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
